author: Yong Pung How CJ (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Tan Sue-Ann Melissa v Lim Siang Bok Dennis
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Judith Prakash J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Lawrence Fong (Dominion LLC) for appellant; S Thulasidas (Ling Das and Partners) for respondent
tags-parsed: Family Law/Maintenance/Wife/Application to vary consent order/Former husband consenting to pay sum of money as maintenance on assumption that his earnings would subsequently increase/Wife aware of assumption/Husband subsequently unable to meet payments as assumption proved to be unachievable despite reasonable efforts/Whether this amounted to material change in circumstances entitling court to vary maintenance order/Section 118 Women's Charter (Cap 353, 1997 Rev Ed)
